Description: Fragment of oval handle at neck join of a Rhodian pottery transport amphora. Clay fine orange-brown. Rectangular stamp.
Curator's comments: Name Zenon. The die is close to that of Alexandria, Greco-Roman Museum, ABC 0363.27.
Bibliographic references: Stoddart 1847 / Memoir on the inscribed pottery of Rhodes, Cnidus and other Greek Cities (284)
